creator: peterpeter
descriptionHtml:
Horse racing and Mark Six info of Hong Kong, NO oversea racing info
App aims on minimal and functional.
Possess sort, search and favorite item management features

Update
server billing has unknown issue after mid June 2019, message speed has affected, sorry for the inconveniences

Disclaimer
Application's data should be used for general reference only.
Although publisher takes his effort to maintain accuracy and integrity of the data, he is not taking responsibilities for any damages or loss caused by the use of the application.
Sorry for any inconvenience.

Importance notice
Application use google app engine, quota is limit,
and it would be reset on HKT 15:00(16:00 with American DST)

ios version
https://itunes.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewSoftware?id=1213983744
descriptionShort: Horse racing & Mark Six info of Hong Kong, NO oversea racing info

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
passed alpha test
(1.39) web search by browser much faster
(1.37) web search action
(1.35) share format
(1.32) font size use google base 16,14, ..
(1.31) font size by "screen density, system and app settings" comprehensively
(1.30) font size also by "screen density"
feature: horse racing fav sort has extra drag and drop sort

and it would be reset on HKT 15:00(16:00 with American DST)

ios version

descriptionShort: Horse racing & Mark Six info of Hong Kong, NO oversea racing info

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
3.1 fix web search
3 platform upgrade
fix sharing

title: HkBetInfo

creator: peterpeter
descriptionHtml:
Horse racing and Mark Six info of Hong Kong, NO oversea racing info
App aims on minimal and functional.
Possess sort, search and favorite item management features

When error in updating data,
Please try "System Settings", "Apps", "Clear Storage"

Update
server billing has unknown issue after mid June 2019, message speed has affected, sorry for the inconveniences

Disclaimer
Application's data should be used for general reference only.
Although publisher takes his effort to maintain accuracy and integrity of the data, he is not taking responsibilities for any damages or loss caused by the use of the application.
Sorry for any inconvenience.
